abstract: Manohla Dargis reviews movie Valley of Love, written and directed by  Guillaume Nicloux and starring Isabelle Huppert and Gerard Depardieu.

headline.print_headline: The Pitiless Desert as a Trap for Raw Truths
headline.main: Review: In ‘Valley of Love,’ Isabelle Huppert and Gérard Depardieu as Mourning Parents

snippet: The film, set in an otherworldly Death Valley landscape, depicts a once-married couple reflecting on a son who committed suicide.
lead_paragraph: The film, set in an otherworldly Death Valley landscape, depicts a once-married couple reflecting on a son who committed suicide.
